# Tutorials Docs

- [Read values from an analog-to-digital converter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/adc.md): Learn how to read variable voltage values using an analog-to-digital converter.
- [Blink an LED](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/blink-led.md): Learn how to blink an LED with the .NET IoT Libraries.
- [Use GPIO for binary input](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/gpio-input.md): Learn how to use GPIO for binary input with the .NET IoT Libraries.
- [Display text on an LCD](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/lcd-display.md): Learn how to display characters on a liquid crystal display with the .NET IoT Libraries.
- [Read environmental conditions from a sensor](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/temp-sensor.md): Learn how to read temperature, barometric pressure, and humidity with the .NET IoT Libraries.
